column5: I figured some of you guys might be interested as I know a bunch of you are headed there this year.  Eddies camp will be featured in an episode of Canada In The Rough, Wild TV tonight at 7pm. It's also on Global Sat 6:30am.  Thomas Pigeon filmed a moose hunt up there last fall.  I havn't seen it yet myself but heard it's pretty good.   Cheers,  Mike
just watched it on global this morning.  looks like an awesome camp.  thanks for the heads up!
